Interface Admin

All Known Implementing Classes:
Manager, Officer
public interface Admin
Admin Interface for administrative functionalities in the BTO system. This interface provides default and abstract methods for managing BTO projects, replying to enquiries, and handling officer interactions. Implementing classes (e.g., Manager, Officer) gain access to reusable logic such as overlap checks and enquiry replies. Authorised roles: "officer", "manager".

  • Method Details

    • clashApplication

      default boolean clashApplication(BTO bto, List<BTO> managingBTO)
      Checks if the given BTO project overlaps in application period with any existing managed projects.
      Parameters:
      bto - the new BTO project to check
      managingBTO - list of BTO projects the user is currently managing
      Returns:
      true if the application dates clash, false otherwise

    • managingBTO

      void managingBTO(List<Integer> managingId, Project<BTO> btoProj, Project<Application> appProj, Project<Enquiries> enquiryProj) throws InputMismatchException, InvalidInput
      Abstract method to access and manage BTO projects. This method is implemented by roles such as Manager or Officer to view or manage projects.
      Parameters:
      managingId - list of project IDs the user manages
      btoProj - the project list containing all BTOs
      appProj - the project list containing applications
      enquiryProj - the project list containing enquiries
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - if user input format is incorrect
      InvalidInput - if a required field is invalid

    • replyEnquiry

      default void replyEnquiry(int enquiryId, String role, Project<Enquiries> enquiryProj, Scanner sc) throws InvalidInput
      Replies to a specific enquiry if it hasn't been answered yet. Prompts user for reply input and updates the corresponding enquiry record.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - the ID of the enquiry to reply to
      role - the user role performing the reply
      enquiryProj - the list of all enquiries
      sc - scanner for user input
      Throws:
      InvalidInput - if reply content is invalid or empty
